History
-------

0.3.1 (2016-01-11)
++++++++++++++++++

* Add setting to disable rendering


0.3.0 (2016-01-06)
++++++++++++++++++

* Enable rendering in related field access

++++++++++++++++++

* Add `with_context` to `RenderTemplateManager`


0.1.0 (2015-10-02)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release on PyPI.
